item.title: pORTALS

item.description:
@system wrote:

makeGlobalObject(Xcoord,Ycoords,Code of Portal, -3, 10);//Fences
find a previous portal code and search untill u get something liek this:

if (objectID == Code of Portal) { teleportToX = Xcoord were to tele?; teleportToY = YCoord were to tele; }
